Test Name: Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) DNA, Real-Time PCR
Purpose: To detect and quantify Hepatitis B virus (HBV) DNA in patient samples for diagnosis and monitoring of infection.
Container: EDTA (lavender top) tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument (e.g., ABI 7500 or Roche LightCycler)
